text: This research embarks on a journey to improve the dynamics of English language teaching and cross-cultural communication between Chinese and foreign cultures. Through the lens of artificial intelligence, the study delves into the intricate world of English text emotion expression and information communication. By harnessing the power of the BiLSTM neural network, the study seeks to decode the emotional nuances of English text, enhancing the richness of communication and understanding across cultural boundaries.
name: fid-059
